Package com.agorapulse.gru

Class Gru

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.agorapulse.gru.Gru
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable
    public class Gru
extends Object
implements Closeable
    Gru steals the controller's unit test to verify controller's actions in context.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • equip

        @Deprecated
public static Gru equip​(Client client)
        Deprecated.
        use create(Client) instead
        Steals the unit test for himself.

        Typical usage is Gru gru = Gru.create(this)

        Parameters:
        client - unit test being stolen
        Returns:
        new Gru instance stealing current unit test

      • create

        public static Gru create​(Client client)
        Creates Gru's instance for a given unit test.

        Typical usage is Gru gru = Gru.create(this)

        Parameters:
        client - unit test
        Returns:
        new Gru instance using the current unit test

      • prepare

        public final Gru prepare​(Consumer<TestDefinitionBuilder> configuration)
        Prepare every test with following configuration.
        Parameters:
        configuration - configuration applied to every feature method
        Returns:
        self

      • prepare

        public final Gru prepare​(String baseUri)
        Prepare tests with given base URI.
        Parameters:
        baseUri - the base URI for the test calls
        Returns:
        self

      • engage

        public final Gru engage​(Minion minion)
        Adds minion to the squad for current test.
        Parameters:
        minion - minion to be added to the squad
        Returns:
        self

      • getSquad

        public Squad getSquad()
        Returns the current Squad.

        New squad is created after each call to close() or reset() methods that are called automatically after verify(Consumer) method. Use test(Consumer) and verify() separately if you need to access the squad.

        Returns:
        the current Squad

      • close

        public void close()
        Checks if the expectations has been verified and resets the internal state.
        Specified by:
        close in interface AutoCloseable
        Specified by:
        close in interface Closeable

      • verify

        public final void verify​(Consumer<TestDefinitionBuilder> expectation)
                  throws Throwable
        Defines and verifies API test and runs the controller initialization and the action under test.

        Parameters:
        expectation - test definition
        Throws:
        Throwable

      • test

        public final Gru test​(Consumer<TestDefinitionBuilder> expectation)
        Defines API test and runs the controller initialization and the action under test.

        Use this method either in when or expect block.

        Parameters:
        expectation - test definition
        Returns:
        self, note that when Groovy Truth is evaluated, verify method is called automatically

      • verify

        public final boolean verify()
                     throws Throwable
        Verifies all expectations.
        Returns:
        true if all verifications are successful
        Throws:
        AssertionError - if any verification fails
        Throwable

      • reset

        public Gru reset()
        Reset the internal state. This is done by the rule automatically.

      • reset

        public Gru reset​(boolean resetConfigurations)
        Reset the internal state. This is done by the rule automatically.
        Parameters:
        resetConfigurations - also clear the configurations created using prepare(Consumer) method
